title: Who can apply
description: To be eligible for a study permit, you must meet specific requirements.

substeps.title: Eligibility for a study permit
substeps.description: You must have a letter of acceptance from a designated learning institution (DLI).

substeps.title: Exceptions
substeps.description: Some individuals may be exempt from requiring a study permit under special circumstances.

title: Get your documents ready
description: Before applying, ensure you have all required documents including ID and financial proof.
